title: The first post!
content:
Google released .ing domain last year. Since then, I wanted to buy such a domain name for myself. It feels both exciting and uncertain.

I think I am about to express a part of myself for which I have mixed feelings.

The setup is easy and takes ~2 hours?

I got my domain name from namecheap. It feels less insecurity that I can not buy it permanently but it seems economically better (5 years for ~$60).

For the hosting services, I looked into some website building tutorials and decided to get hosting service from SiteGround. It is about ~$25 per year.

After that it will be like install wordpress, SSL, etc.
excerpt: Google released .ing domain last year. Since then, I wanted to buy such a domain name for myself. It feels both exciting and uncertain
